description: This file defines the ProductService class responsible for product search, retrieval, and price history functionalities within the backend API. It interacts with repositories for product data and price snapshots, providing methods to search products, get a product by ID, and retrieve recent price history.

classes.name: ProductService
classes.description: Service class providing product search, retrieval by ID, and recent price history functionalities.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a product search with optional query string; supports pagination.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a product by its unique identifier.

methods.name: recentPriceHistory
methods.description: Returns the latest 10 price snapshots for a given product.
